mapper.insert: update play_record set location = #{location} where stu_id = #{stuId} and sec_id = #{secId};
mapper.update: update play_record set over = #{over} where stu_id = #{stuId} and sec_id = #{secId};
mapper.select: select video_comment.id as id,stu_id,stu.name as name,stu.avatar as avatar,content,location,`time` from video_comment join stu on stu.id = video_comment.stu_id where sec_id = #{filter.secId} order by `time` desc
